replies.body:
I actually don't remember, but I use it for pretty much everything..

EDIT: Oh oh! I remember! I was thinking of names for a crafting Youtube channel I used to have.. Then I was eating a cupcake and then the idea poofed into mind! I tryed the s instead of the z at the end.. I liked the z better so therefor FrostedCupcakez!
